FuncDef: The display pki credential-storage-path command displays the default path where a PKI certificate is stored. The display pki credential-storage-path command displays the default path where a PKI certificate is stored. By default, the certificates of the system is stored in the "flash:/pki/public" directory.
ExtraInfo:
The display pki credential-storage-path command displays the default path where a PKI certificate is stored.
You can also run the cd pki and dir commands in the user view in sequence to view the path where a PKI certificate is stored. An example is as follows:
cd pki
dir
Directory of flash:/pki/
Idx Attr Size(Byte) Date Time FileName
0 drw- - Jul 06 2017 16:11:48 public //Directory in the system
